page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: OUR BLOCK IS SITUATED TO THE NORTH WEST OF THE TOWN OF NEATH IN WEST GLAMORGAN. IT CONTAINS A NUMBER OF COUNCIL AND PRIVATE HOUSING ESTATES, DECIDUOUS AND CONIFER WOODLANDS AND FARMLAND. THE HIGHEST POINT IN THE BLOCK IS MYNYDD DRUMAU WHICH RISES TO 272 M. THE POPULATED AREAS HAVE DEVELOPED AROUND THE VILLAGES OF CADOXTON, RHYDDINGS, BRYNCOCH AND NEATH ABBEY. THERE ARE A NUMBER OF SMALL INDUSTRIES EMPLOYING UP TO 25 PEOPLE IN THE BLOCK BUT MOST PEOPLE TRAVEL INTO THE NEARBY TOWNS OF NEATH, PORT TALBOT AND SWANSEA TO WORK. THE TOWN OF NEATH IS STEEPED IN HISTORY.THIS INCLUDES ITS CELTIC ORIGINS , ROMAN OCCUPATION,FORTIFIED CASTLE AND CISTERCIAN MONASTERY/ABBEY.
